title: Chicken Wrap
ingredients: ['drizzle olive oil', '1 tin sweetcorn, drained', '1/2 red pepper, chopped', '1/2 green pepper, chopped', '1/2 yellow pepper, chopped', '1/2 onion, chopped', 'chicken tikka sauce', 'a pinch of salt', '3 pinches of pepper', 'ready cooked chicken!!!!!!!!', 'wrap / pitta bread']
